title: Nature walkabout
creator_credit: William Copland, Vincent Serventy and Cardin Film Service
brief_description: Wildlife in and around the city of Perth and the southern areas and coastlines of West Australia. Shows a variety of animals going about their daily experiences with a main focus on birdlife. Written and photographed by Vincent and Carol Serventy. Narrated by Kevin Golsby.
creator_credit_for_label: William Copland, Vincent Serventy and Cardin Film Service
